title: Use the dev/ branch prefix
body:
This pull request updates the branch naming convention across several documentation and workflow files. The standard for feature and update branches is changed from `copilot/issue-NNNN-description` or `copilot/update-{dep}` to `dev/issue-NNNN-description` or `dev/update-{dep}`. This ensures consistency and clarity in branch naming for all contributors.

**Branch naming convention updates:**

* Updated instructions in `.github/copilot-instructions.md` to use `dev/issue-NNNN-description` instead of `copilot/issue-NNNN-description` for feature branch creation.
* Changed branch creation steps in `.github/skills/add-api/SKILL.md` to use the new `dev/issue-NNNN-description` naming.
* Modified checklists in `.github/skills/add-api/references/checklists.md` to reflect the new branch naming convention.
* Updated bug fix workflow in `.github/skills/bug-fix/SKILL.md` to use `dev/issue-NNNN-short-description` for branch naming and pushing.

**Native dependency update workflow changes:**

* Standardized all references to update branches in `.github/skills/native-dependency-update/SKILL.md` from `copilot/update-{dep}` to `dev/update-{dep}` throughout instructions, tables, and checklists. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL60-R68) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL145-R158) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL174-R174) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-f9c71b6da8951243004ec22339d2de5d5703f868295706fcc613bb26f17365cfL192-R192)
